extractions.extraction_text: Design & UX delivers specs → Aryaman handles procurement → Tim handles receiving.

attributes.content: Deliver specs, handle procurement, handle receiving

extractions.extraction_text: Outreach collects dietary data → Aryaman and I pick the vendor → Tim places and manages the order.

attributes.content: Collect dietary data, pick vendor, place and manage order

extractions.extraction_text: I can start scouting pizzerias while RSVPs are still coming in.

attributes.timeframe: while RSVPs are still coming in

extractions.extraction_text: Billy builds the list → Design and Media prep the materials → Billy, Liam and Rachel do outreach → Billy and Aryaman close deals → Board is the safety net.

attributes.content: Build the list, prepare the materials, do outreach, close deals, and act as safety net

extractions.extraction_text: And there's a hard 10-day checkpoint for escalation.
I want Reuban kept in the loop on sponsor confirmations too — once we close a sponsor, Marketing needs to know immediately so they can plan co-branded content and social posts.

attributes.content: Keep Reuban in the loop on sponsor confirmations and notify Marketing immediately

extractions.extraction_text: I'll make sure that's in the reporting flow.

attributes.content: Include sponsor confirmation updates in the reporting flow

extractions.extraction_text: I'll send the kickoff message to department heads today.

attributes.content: Send the kickoff message to department heads
